I’m so

relieved to hear

they received

the theory of natural selection positively.

I’ve only written

half the manuscript

I’ll have to hurry

to finish it.

Darwin worked hard to finish

his book on the theory of natural selection, including as many facts and types of evidence as he could.

In May 1859, Darwin completed his thesis, a total of 500 pages.

However, the thesis was so long that he decided to publish it as a book instead.

I’m worried that

the book won’t sell,

and the publisher will lose money.

The content is sure to provoke controversy, so it should be popular.

166
